title: Sandboxie 3.24 + Keygen (EVERYONE should have this)

                                   /_/                                
PRESENTS:


Sandboxie 3.24 + Keygen [thanks to Team EMBRACE]


Desription:

When you run a program on your computer, data flows from the hard disk to the program via read operations. The data is then processed and displayed, and finally flows back from the progam to the hard disk via write operations.

Sandboxie changes the rules such that write operations do not make it back to your hard disk.

    * Intercept changes to both your files and registry settings, making it virtually impossible for any software to reach outside the sandbox.
    * Traps cached browser items into the sandbox as a by-product of normal operation, so when you throw away the sandbox, all the history records and other side-effects of your browsing disappear as well.


Installation Instructions:

1) Run &#039;Sandboxie 3.24 Installer&#039;.
2) After installation, use the Keygen to register the application. You can use any username you wish. The registration can be found in the file menu in Help > Register Sandboxie.
3) Enjoy! :-]


IN A NUTSHELL:

- Basically, this program lets you run anything you wish in a virtualized environment, meaning... anything you run with Sandboxie will not affect your physical computer. You can even install entire software applications to test run and if you don&#039;t like it, just close Sandboxie and it&#039;s like it never existed (you&#039;ll have to delete the Sandboxie contents for it to be gone completely though). Also, if you find a keygen that contains a virus, just temporarily turn off your Anti-Virus (so that it does not interfere with opening the keygen), run the keygen in Sandboxie, get the information you want from the keygen, close the keygen, turn your Anti-Virus back on and you&#039;re good to go. =] You can also test something you&#039;re suspicious of by installing something and looking at the contents of Sandboxie. Anyway... it&#039;s not complicated and I&#039;m sure you&#039;ll figure it out. Sandboxie is a must for anyone. Peace.

P.S. If you&#039;re wondering, "Isn&#039;t Sandboxie freeware?"... Well technically, yes... but there is a portion of Sandboxie that you have to register, so I thought I&#039;d share the keygen... and to get word out there about Sandboxie.
